Create a social media campaign to promote the hammock as a tool for mental wellness.
Design a hammock with a built-in cooler to keep drinks cold while lounging.
Host a hammock-building workshop where participants can learn how to craft their own hammocks using sustainable materials.
Develop a line of hammock-themed merchandise, such as hammock-printed clothing and accessories, to appeal to customers who want to show off their love for hammocks.
Create a hammock-inspired travel collection, including luggage tags, travel pillows, and hammock-shaped travel bags, to help customers embrace the hammock lifestyle while on the go.
